text: Oliver Windholz is a German business executive who is the current CEO of Phoenix Pharmahandel, and has since February 2014. Prior to his appointment, he served as CEO of Ratiopharm. He concurrently serves as an independent director of Comifar and Tamro.https://www.bloomberg.com/research/stocks/private/person.asp?personId=49704884&privcapId;=5466921 Bloomberg ==References== Category:German chief executives Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Oliver Windholz
